name: Johnny Wizard
text: I'm honestly surprised you didn't get lost on the way.

name: Johnny Wizard
text: Anyway, I'm just happy to win this tournmanet and move on to greener pastures

name: Johnny Wizard
text: Pedestrian courses like this aren't my style don't ya think?

name: Johnny Wizard
text: As if I ever valued your opinion!

name: Johnny Wizard
text: Anyway, I can't wait to see you whiff the first drive
